mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SILVERBOARD( SB_SEQ, CODE_SEQ, SEACH_SEQ, SBTITLE, SBWRITE, SBDATE )VALUES( SB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{code_seq}, #{seach_seq}, #{sbtitle}, #{sbwrite}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT SBTITLE, SBWRITE, TO_CHAR(SBDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') SBDATE FROM SILVERBOARD WHERE SB_SEQ=#{sb_seq};
SELECT SBTITLE, SBWRITE, TO_CHAR(SBDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') SBDATE FROM SILVERBOARD WHERE SEACH_SEQ=9
